txt.en: 'The half-orcs are bold to attack the city where my husband is Thane. The Helmingas are loyal to Grimbold, and will fight to the death to keep Grimslade's walls standing!'
Help save Grimslade from the half-orc attack

'Let us head over to the gate, [placeholder]. I will defend my husband's honour now, even if I did not do so before.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo instance, and cannot be completed in a Fellowship.</rgb>
Hildith is in the Mead Hall at Grimslade.\n\nYou should speak with Hildith.

'We have done it! Now Grimbold will have a home to come back to, no thanks to the treachery of the half-orcs.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]! I do not know what would have become of us without your steadfast aid.'
Hildith is in the Mead Hall at Grimslade.\n\nYou should speak with Hildith.
Hildith is anxious to survive the Half-orcs hoping to put Grimslade to the torch.
